intro: The super-popular singing group “Melon Parker” is now in a visual novel game!
description:
We are the Whatever Club!
The super-popular singing group “Melon Parker” is now in a visual novel game!
This is the youthful story you’ll experience together with MELON PARKER -We are Whatever Club!-

◆Synopsis
We are the Whatever Club!

You and your five childhood friends,
Naroya, Samurai Sho, Soraneko, KAITO, and Kamome,
are members of the private Melonpan High School’s “Whatever Club”!

While cheerfully solving the incidents that happen at school and enjoying your high school life,
you suddenly get the chance to perform at a music festival!?

Can the “Whatever Club” succeed at
the big stage of the music festival?

And where will your youthful story with the five of them lead...

◆Characters
・Naroya (cv. Naroya)
A reliable member who supports you in the Whatever Club.
Uses sharp reasoning skills to solve the mysteries that happen at school.

・Samurai Sho (cv. Samurai Sho)
The Whatever Club’s quick-witted man.
Sometimes ends up in unfortunate situations because of the other members’ wild ideas.

・Soraneko (cv. Soraneko)
Easygoing by nature, and sometimes ends up pulling the others along.
Loves snacks and games, and often invites you to join in.

・KAITO (cv. KAITO)
The self-proclaimed dark hero of the Whatever Club with a eighth-grader syndrome.
Has a kind heart and will always stand by friends and those in trouble.

・Kamome (cv. Kamome)
A gourmet who, like KAITO, also has eighth-grader syndrome tendencies.
Has a mature way of thinking and so the other members often rely on him.
